import React from"react";import{Box,Button,Flex,Tag,Text,useColorModeValue}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import JSZip from"jszip";import{BiDownload}from"react-icons/bi";function ProjectRow(props){var name=props.name,organization=props.organization,owner=props.owner,projid=props.projid,isFinished=props.isFinished,grammarName=props.grammarName,action=props.action,asset=props.asset,scene=props.scene,custom=props.custom,timeline=props.timeline,dash=props.dash;var bgColor=useColorModeValue("gray.200",!dash?"gray.800":"gray.600");var nameColor=useColorModeValue("gray.900","white");var downloadzip=function downloadzip(){var zip=new JSZip();var scenejson=JSON.parse(scene);var actionjson=JSON.parse(action);var assetjson=JSON.parse(asset);var customjson=JSON.parse(custom);var timelinejson=JSON.parse(timeline);zip.folder(name).file("scene.json",JSON.stringify(scenejson,null,2));zip.folder(name).file("action.json",JSON.stringify(actionjson,null,2));zip.folder(name).file("asset.json",JSON.stringify(assetjson,null,2));zip.folder(name).file("custom.json",JSON.stringify(customjson,null,2));zip.folder(name).file("timeline.json",JSON.stringify(timelinejson,null,2));zip.generateAsync({type:"blob"}).then(function(content){var href=URL.createObjectURL(content);var link=document.createElement("a");link.href=href;link.download=name+".zip";document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();// clean up "a" element & remove ObjectURL
document.body.removeChild(link);URL.revokeObjectURL(href);});};return React.createElement(Box,{p:"24px",bg:bgColor,my:"15px",borderRadius:"12px"},React.createElement(Flex,{justify:"space-between",w:"100%"},React.createElement(Flex,{direction:"column",maxWidth:"70%"},React.createElement(Text,{as:Link,to:"/projects/".concat(projid),color:nameColor,fontSize:"md",fontWeight:"bold",mb:"10px"},name),owner&&React.createElement(Text,{color:"gray.500",fontSize:"sm",fontWeight:"semibold"},"Owner Name:"," ",React.createElement(Text,{as:"span",color:"gray.600"},owner)),organization&&React.createElement(Text,{color:"gray.500",fontSize:"sm",fontWeight:"semibold"},"Organization:"," ",React.createElement(Text,{as:"span",color:"gray.600"},organization)),grammarName&&React.createElement(Text,{color:"gray.500",fontSize:"sm",fontWeight:"semibold"},"Validator Name:"," ",React.createElement(Text,{as:"span",color:"gray.600"},grammarName))),React.createElement(Flex,{flexDir:"column"},React.createElement(Box,null,isFinished?React.createElement(Tag,{size:"md",variant:"solid",colorScheme:"green"},"Completed"):React.createElement(Tag,{size:"md",variant:"solid",colorScheme:"yellow"},"Pending")),isFinished&&!dash&&React.createElement(Box,{pt:3},React.createElement(Button,{size:"sm",onClick:downloadzip,leftIcon:React.createElement(BiDownload,null)},"Zip")))));}export default ProjectRow;
